data.comment: The match has started.
Ball safe as Levante is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Sociedad's half?
Levante awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Real Sociedad's Andoni Gorosabel misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Martin Merquelanz for Real Sociedad drives towards goal at Ciutat de Valencia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Real Sociedad throw-in in Levante's half.
In the minute 8, In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Modibo Sagnan for Real Sociedad gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Cesar Soto Grado awards Levante a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Levante just outside Real Sociedad's area.
Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Levante territory.
In the minute 17, Levante drives forward and Ruben Rochina gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad in the half of Levante.
In the minute 19, Free kick Levante.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Levante will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Real Sociedad.
In the minute 21, Ruben Rochina (Levante) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Real Sociedad have got their heads in front thanks to a Alexander Isak strike.
Free kick for Levante in their own half.
In the minute 25, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
In Valencia Real Sociedad attack through Igor Zubeldia. The finish is off target, however.
Levante have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Levante in the half of Real Sociedad.
Levante's Dani Gomez is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal! Roger Marti levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 29, Cesar Soto Grado awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
In the minute 31, Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Real Sociedad close to the penalty box.
Alexander Isak (Real Sociedad) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Corner awarded to Levante.
In the minute 38, Important block from the Real Sociedad defence as Mickael Malsa fires in a strike for Levante.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Throw-in Real Sociedad.
In the minute 40, Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
Levante are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Real Sociedad throw-in in Levante's half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
The first-half has ended.
Cesar Soto Grado has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Ciutat de Valencia.
In the minute 46, Paco Lopez (Levante) is making a first substitution, with Rober Pier replacing Sergio Postigo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Real Sociedad in the half of Levante.
Nikola Vukcevic is booked for the home team.
Real Sociedad's Igor Zubeldia breaks free at Ciutat de Valencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
Cesar Soto Grado awards Levante a goal kick.
Real Sociedad awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 51, Levante push forward at Ciutat de Valencia and Jorge Miramon gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Real Sociedad defence.
Levante pushes forward through Jose Luis Morales, whose finish on goal is saved.
Levante have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
In the minute 52, Roger Marti (Levante) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Ciutat de Valencia.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Sociedad's half?
In the minute 55, In Valencia, Dani Gomez of Levante is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Real Sociedad have a dangerous throw-in.
Real Sociedad to take a throw-in in Levante territory.
In the minute 57, Levante have a goal kick.
Levante make their second substitution with Jorge De Frutos Sebastian replacing Jose Luis Morales.
Paco Lopez is making the team's third substitution at Ciutat de Valencia with Gonzalo Melero replacing Nikola Vukcevic.
In the minute 58, Cesar Soto Grado awards Real Sociedad a goal kick.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the away team a throw-in.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 60, Cesar Soto Grado signals a Real Sociedad throw-in in Levante's half.
Throw-in for Levante in the half of Real Sociedad.
Levante are pushing forward but Ruben Rochina's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The away team replace Ander Guevara with Martin Zubimendi.
Robin Le Normand is replacing Modibo Sagnan for the away team.
Throw-in for Levante in their own half.
Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Ciutat de Valencia.
In the minute 66, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Real Sociedad.
Can Real Sociedad get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Levante's half?
Real Sociedad's Martin Merquelanz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 67, Levante have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Real Sociedad's Portu breaks free at Ciutat de Valencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
Gonzalo Melero of Levante gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Real Sociedad at Ciutat de Valencia.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Real Sociedad in the half of Levante.
Igor Zubeldia of Real Sociedad smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Valencia, Real Sociedad push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 73, Can Real Sociedad capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Levante's half?
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergio Leon is on a sub for Roger Marti for Levante.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Levante.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Real Sociedad in their own half.
Throw-in Real Sociedad.
In the minute 79, Willian Jose is replacing Portu for Real Sociedad at Ciutat de Valencia.
The away team have replaced Ander Barrenetxea with Nacho Monreal. This is the fourth substitution made today by Imanol Alguacil.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Real Sociedad at Ciutat de Valencia.
Real Sociedad have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Real Sociedad push forward at Ciutat de Valencia and Igor Zubeldia gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Levante defence.
In the minute 82, Free kick Levante.
Alexander Isak (Real Sociedad) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Real Sociedad needs to be cautious. Levante have an attacking throw-in.
Real Sociedad awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Alexander Isak (Real Sociedad) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Son is replacing Dani Gomez for Levante at Ciutat de Valencia.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Levante in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Jorge De Frutos Sebastian.
That's a fine assist from Gonzalo Melero.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Real Sociedad is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Real Sociedad's Alexander Isak is on target but unsuccessful.
Andoni Gorosabel is back on the pitch.
Levante to take a throw-in in Real Sociedad territory.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Valencia.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Levante throw-in in Real Sociedad's half.
Free kick for Real Sociedad in their own half.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
Corner awarded to Real Sociedad.
Real Sociedad are coming forward and Mikel Merino gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Cesar Soto Grado awards Levante a goal kick.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
The match at Ciutat de Valencia has been interrupted briefly for a check on Andoni Gorosabel, who is down injured.
It seems as if Andoni Gorosabel is unable to continue. Jon Bautista replaces him for the away team.
